title: Enhancing Patient Care Competencies: AR Game-Based Mathematics Learning for Emotional-Motivational State Reinforcement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary calculus and statistics, along with basic mobile device operation skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Enhance learning motivation levels by 30%+ when solving math problems via AR game mechanics.
Measure and self-report emotional-motivational states (flow states) at least twice in multimedia learning environments.
Evaluate digital learning scenario design skills (AR/game elements) using a 4-level rubric.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
